title: Usergrid 536
body:
This is the first pass of the queryindex rewrite into the new structure.  This structure is outlined in this ticket.

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/USERGRID-536

Note that several tests in core fail assertions.  I will work on these directly in the dev branch to stabilize, since this work is now blocking other developers.  These failures are due to the default sort ordering working correctly, and incorrect result assertion order in the tests.

title: [USERGRID-497] - fixes for ApplicationResourceIT unit tests
body:
Now only one test case fails in ApplicationResourceIT. Ignored couple of testcases which tests html response as we have problems with jsp and embedded tomcat 7.

Raised https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/USERGRID-566 for the failed testcase.

title: Update <spring-java-version> to 1.0.1.RELEASE
body:
Update Maven dependency for <spring-java-version> from 1.0.0.M4 to 1.0.1.RELEASE to fix missing dependency during compilation.

Maven Central Repository only provide 'RELEASE' versions:
http://search.maven.org/#search%7Cgav%7C1%7Cg%3A%22org.springframework.android%22%20AND%20a%3A%22spring-android-auth%22

Usergrid 466
body:
Updated to the latest Codehale metrics

Removed unused annotations

Adds additional monitoring metrics.

Added a durable queue for indexing with using SQS as well as in memory queue.

Added a worker count for multi threaded queue consumption

Adds a dedicated master node to ES cluster.

title: Fix for USERGRID-448: Remove redundant appinfos collections in ManagementServiceImpl
body:
DO NOT MERGE

Needs careful review.

Changes to merge appinfo and application_info collections into one application_info collection. Also:
- Removed unnecessary system and default applications
- Now use seek rather than search to load application info entities
- Uncommented the parts of ApplicationDeleteTest that did not work before the appinfo fix
- Will migrate old appinfo collection to application_info on startup, but can be configured to skip that

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/USERGRID-448

title: Usergrid 273
body:
Fixes several bugs and upgrades our test infrastructure.  Some key changes.  

1) Indexes are deleted after tests
2) Before a JVM starts, Cassandra and ES are changed
3) Aquillian is now used to test the REST tier (not yet complete)

title: Removed spurious character
body:
Build error:

[ERROR] /home/app/stack/corepersistence/collection/src/test/java/org/apache/usergrid/persistence/collection/util/EntityHelper.java:[79,8] error: unmappable character for encoding ASCII

Fixed by removal of spurious character.

title: Portal: Use same host and port for override url (default)
body: Try and use the same hostname and port for the API overrideUrl. Assumes that Portal and Usergrid are deployed on the same tomcat instance. For example, this would be useful when a single Tomcat instance is being used to host both portal and usergrid apps.
